text:
@GavinNewsom Science... far from it!
Lockdowns and mask doesn't work. Proof? A Vaccine will not magically fix everything. 
The flu(spanish flu) is still around after 100 years. 
Your script should say, "CA's response to #COVID19 is based on politics."
Not gonna hate. Job is a job. 
Bah bah...
